definitions: A small flap or fold, especially of a garment or headdress.
A decorative flap or fold on a piece of clothing or fabric.
A fleshy lobe or wattle, especially on the head of a bird or other animal.
examples: The dress featured a delicate lace lappet.
The bird's head was adorned with prominent lappets.
She adjusted the lappet of her bonnet.
